member.name: M:MigrationTools.DataContracts.Pipelines.Process.ShouldSerializeYamlFilename
member.summary: If the value is set, then serialize it, if it isn't don't
member.returns: bool on if the YamlFilename should be serialized.

member.name: M:MigrationTools.DataContracts.Pipelines.Process.ShouldSerializePhases
member.summary: If the type is 1 then this is a classis pipeline, so the phases should be serialized.
member.returns: bool on if the Phases should be serialized.

member.name: M:MigrationTools.DataContracts.RestApiDefinition.ResetObject
member.summary: reset values that cannot be set on new objects

member.name: M:MigrationTools.DataContracts.RestApiDefinition.HasTaskGroups
member.summary: Checks whether the Definition references Taskgroups

member.name: M:MigrationTools.DataContracts.RestApiDefinition.HasVariableGroups
member.summary: Checks whether the Definition references Variablegroups

member.name: T:MigrationTools.EndpointEnrichers.WorkItemAttachmentEnricherOptions
member.summary: Configuration options for the Work Item Attachment Enricher that handles the download, processing, and migration of work item attachments between endpoints.

member.name: P:MigrationTools.EndpointEnrichers.WorkItemAttachmentEnricherOptions.WorkingPath
member.summary: Local file system path used as working directory for downloading and processing attachments during migration. Should have sufficient disk space and proper permissions.

member.name: P:MigrationTools.EndpointEnrichers.WorkItemAttachmentEnricherOptions.MaxSize
member.summary: Maximum size in bytes for attachments that will be processed. Attachments larger than this size will be skipped to prevent performance issues.

member.name: P:MigrationTools.EndpointEnrichers.WorkItemAttachmentEnricherOptions.ToConfigure
member.summary: Gets the type of the enricher that this configuration applies to.

member.name: M:MigrationTools.EndpointEnrichers.WorkItemAttachmentEnricherOptions.SetDefaults
member.summary: Sets the default values for the work item attachment enricher configuration.

member.name: T:MigrationTools.EndpointEnrichers.WorkItemCreatedEnricherOptions
member.summary: Configuration options for the Work Item Created Enricher that preserves original creation metadata when migrating work items between endpoints.

member.name: P:MigrationTools.EndpointEnrichers.WorkItemCreatedEnricherOptions.UpdateCreatedDate
member.summary: When true, updates the created date of migrated work items to match the original creation date from the source system.

member.name: P:MigrationTools.EndpointEnrichers.WorkItemCreatedEnricherOptions.UpdateCreatedBy
member.summary: When true, updates the created by field of migrated work items to match the original creator from the source system.

member.name: P:MigrationTools.EndpointEnrichers.WorkItemCreatedEnricherOptions.ToConfigure
member.summary: Gets the type of the enricher that this configuration applies to.

member.name: M:MigrationTools.EndpointEnrichers.WorkItemCreatedEnricherOptions.SetDefaults
member.summary: Sets the default values for the work item created enricher configuration.

member.name: T:MigrationTools.EndpointEnrichers.WorkItemEmbedEnricherOptions
member.summary: Configuration options for the Work Item Embed Enricher that handles embedded content and images within work item fields during migration.

member.name: P:MigrationTools.EndpointEnrichers.WorkItemEmbedEnricherOptions.WorkingPath
member.summary: Local file system path used as working directory for processing embedded content and images during migration. Should have sufficient disk space and proper permissions.

member.name: P:MigrationTools.EndpointEnrichers.WorkItemEmbedEnricherOptions.ToConfigure
member.summary: Gets the type of the enricher that this configuration applies to.

member.name: M:MigrationTools.EndpointEnrichers.WorkItemEmbedEnricherOptions.SetDefaults
member.summary: Sets the default values for the work item embed enricher configuration.

member.name: T:MigrationTools.EndpointEnrichers.WorkItemFieldTableEnricherOptions
member.summary: Configuration options for the Work Item Field Table Enricher that processes and transforms table data within work item fields during migration.

member.name: P:MigrationTools.EndpointEnrichers.WorkItemFieldTableEnricherOptions.ToConfigure
member.summary: Gets the type of the enricher that this configuration applies to.

member.name: M:MigrationTools.EndpointEnrichers.WorkItemFieldTableEnricherOptions.SetDefaults
member.summary: Sets the default values for the work item field table enricher configuration.

member.name: T:MigrationTools.EndpointEnrichers.WorkItemLinkEnricherOptions
member.summary: Configuration options for the Work Item Link Enricher that handles the migration and processing of work item links between different endpoints.

member.name: P:MigrationTools.EndpointEnrichers.WorkItemLinkEnricherOptions.SaveEachAsAdded
member.summary: When true, saves each work item after adding links to ensure immediate persistence. When false, saves in batches for better performance.

member.name: P:MigrationTools.EndpointEnrichers.WorkItemLinkEnricherOptions.ToConfigure
member.summary: Gets the type of the enricher that this configuration applies to.

member.name: M:MigrationTools.EndpointEnrichers.WorkItemLinkEnricherOptions.SetDefaults
member.summary: Sets the default values for the work item link enricher configuration.

member.name: P:MigrationTools.Enrichers.ProcessorEnricherOptions.Enabled
member.summary: If enabled this will run this migrator

member.name: P:MigrationTools.Enrichers.ProcessorEnricherOptions.RefName
member.summary: For internal use

member.name: P:MigrationTools.Options.IOptions.Enabled
member.summary: Will be used if enabled

member.name: T:MigrationTools.Options.NetworkCredentialsOptions
member.summary: Configuration options for network credentials used when connecting to source and target systems. This class is marked as obsolete and should not be used in new implementations.

member.name: P:MigrationTools.Options.NetworkCredentialsOptions.Source
member.summary: Gets or sets the network credentials for connecting to the source system.

member.name: P:MigrationTools.Options.NetworkCredentialsOptions.Target
member.summary: Gets or sets the network credentials for connecting to the target system.

member.name: T:MigrationTools.Options.NetworkCredentials
member.summary: Represents network authentication credentials including domain, username, and password for connecting to TFS or other network-based systems.

member.name: P:MigrationTools.Options.NetworkCredentials.Domain
member.summary: Gets or sets the domain name for Windows authentication (e.g., "CONTOSO" or "contoso.com").

member.name: P:MigrationTools.Options.NetworkCredentials.UserName
member.summary: Gets or sets the username for authentication. Should not include the domain prefix.

member.name: P:MigrationTools.Options.NetworkCredentials.Password
member.summary: Gets or sets the password for authentication. This value is masked in JSON serialization for security.

member.name: T:MigrationTools.Options.QueryOptions
member.summary: Configuration options for defining work item queries used in migration processes. Supports WIQL (Work Item Query Language) queries with parameterization.

member.name: P:MigrationTools.Options.QueryOptions.Query
member.summary: Gets or sets the WIQL (Work Item Query Language) query string used to select work items for processing. Must be a valid WIQL query.

member.name: P:MigrationTools.Options.QueryOptions.Parameters
member.summary: Gets or sets a dictionary of query parameters that can be substituted into the WIQL query. Key represents the parameter name, value represents the parameter value.

member.name: P:MigrationTools.Processors.Infrastructure.IProcessorOptions.SourceName
member.summary: This is the `IEndpoint` that will be used as the source of the Migration. Can be null for a write only processor.

member.name: P:MigrationTools.Processors.Infrastructure.IProcessorOptions.TargetName
member.summary: This is the `IEndpoint` that will be used as the Target of the Migration. Can be null for a read only processor.

member.name: P:MigrationTools.Processors.Infrastructure.IProcessorOptions.Enrichers
member.summary: List of Enrichers that can be used to add more features to this processor. Only works with Native Processors and not legacy Processors.

member.name: P:MigrationTools.Processors.Infrastructure.ProcessorOptions.Enabled
member.summary: If set to `true` then the processor will run. Set to `false` and the processor will not run.

member.name: P:MigrationTools.Processors.Infrastructure.ProcessorOptions.Enrichers
member.summary: List of Enrichers that can be used to add more features to this processor. Only works with Native Processors and not legacy Processors.

member.name: P:MigrationTools.Processors.Infrastructure.ProcessorOptions.RefName
member.summary: `Refname` will be used in the future to allow for using named Options without the need to copy all of the options.

member.name: T:MigrationTools.Processors.WorkItemTrackingProcessor
member.summary: This processor is intended, with the aid of [ProcessorEnrichers](../ProcessorEnrichers/index.md), to allow the migration of Work Items between two [Endpoints](../Endpoints/index.md).

member.name: T:MigrationTools.Processors.WorkItemTrackingProcessorOptions
member.summary: Configuration options for the WorkItemTrackingProcessor, which handles migration of work items between endpoints.

member.name: P:MigrationTools.Processors.WorkItemTrackingProcessorOptions.ReplayRevisions
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to replay all revisions during migration.

member.name: P:MigrationTools.Processors.WorkItemTrackingProcessorOptions.CollapseRevisions
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to collapse revisions into a single work item.

member.name: P:MigrationTools.Processors.WorkItemTrackingProcessorOptions.WorkItemCreateRetryLimit
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of times to retry work item creation if it fails.

member.name: T:MigrationTools.Tools.FieldMappingTool
member.summary: Tool for applying field mapping transformations to work items during migration, supporting various field mapping strategies like direct mapping, regex transformations, and value lookups.

member.name: M:MigrationTools.Tools.FieldMappingTool.#ctor(Microsoft.Extensions.Options.IOptions{MigrationTools.Tools.FieldMappingToolOptions},System.IServiceProvider,Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger{MigrationTools.Tools.Infrastructure.ITool},MigrationTools.ITelemetryLogger)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the FieldMappingTool class.

member.name: T:MigrationTools.Tools.FieldMappingToolOptions
member.summary: Configuration options for the FieldMappingTool, defining the collection of field mappings to apply during work item migration.

member.name: P:MigrationTools.Tools.FieldMappingToolOptions.FieldMaps
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of field mapping configurations to apply.

member.name: T:MigrationTools.Tools.FieldMappingToolOptions.ConfigureOptions
member.summary: Configuration provider for field mapping tool options, handling the loading of field map configurations from configuration sources.

member.name: M:MigrationTools.Tools.FieldMappingToolOptions.ConfigureOptions.#ctor(Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfiguration)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ConfigureOptions class.

member.name: M:MigrationTools.Tools.FieldMappingToolOptions.ConfigureOptions.Configure(MigrationTools.Tools.FieldMappingToolOptions)
member.summary: Configures the field mapping tool options from the configuration source.

member.name: T:MigrationTools.Tools.FieldCalculationMapOptions
member.summary: Performs mathematical calculations on numeric fields using NCalc expressions during migration.

member.name: P:MigrationTools.Tools.FieldCalculationMapOptions.expression
member.summary: Gets or sets the NCalc expression to evaluate. Variables in the expression should be enclosed in square brackets (e.g., "[x]*2").

member.name: P:MigrationTools.Tools.FieldCalculationMapOptions.parameters
member.summary: Gets or sets a dictionary mapping variable names used in the expression to source field reference names.

member.name: P:MigrationTools.Tools.FieldCalculationMapOptions.targetField
member.summary: Gets or sets the target field reference name where the calculated result will be stored.

member.name: M:MigrationTools.Tools.FieldCalculationMapOptions.SetExampleConfigDefaults
member.summary: Sets example configuration defaults for documentation purposes.

member.name: M:MigrationTools.Tools.FieldCalculationMapOptions.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the FieldCalculationMapOptions class.

member.name: T:MigrationTools.Tools.FieldClearMapOptions
member.summary: Allows you to set an already populated field to Null. This will only work with fields that support null.

member.name: P:MigrationTools.Tools.FieldClearMapOptions.targetField
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the target field to be cleared/set to null during work item migration.

member.name: T:MigrationTools.Tools.FieldLiteralMapOptions
member.summary: Sets a field on the `target` to b a specific value.

member.name: P:MigrationTools.Tools.FieldLiteralMapOptions.targetField
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the target field that will be set to the specified literal value.

member.name: P:MigrationTools.Tools.FieldLiteralMapOptions.value
member.summary: Gets or sets the literal value that will be assigned to the target field during migration.

member.name: T:MigrationTools.Tools.FieldMergeMapOptions
member.summary: Ever wanted to merge two or three fields? This mapping will let you do just that.

member.name: T:MigrationTools.Tools.FieldSkipMapOptions
member.summary: Allows you to skip populating an existing field. Value in target with be reset to its OriginalValue.

member.name: P:MigrationTools.Tools.FieldSkipMapOptions.targetField
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the target field that should be skipped during migration, resetting it to its original value.

member.name: T:MigrationTools.Tools.FieldToFieldMapOptions
member.summary: Just want to map one field to another? This is the one for you.

member.name: P:MigrationTools.Tools.FieldToFieldMapOptions.sourceField
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the source field to copy data from during migration.

member.name: P:MigrationTools.Tools.FieldToFieldMapOptions.targetField
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the target field to copy data to during migration.

member.name: P:MigrationTools.Tools.FieldToFieldMapOptions.defaultValue
member.summary: Gets or sets the default value to use when the source field is empty or null.

member.name: T:MigrationTools.Tools.FieldToFieldMultiMapOptions
member.summary: Want to setup a bunch of field maps in a single go. Use this shortcut!

member.name: T:MigrationTools.Tools.FieldToTagFieldMapOptions
member.summary: Want to take a field and convert its value to a tag? Done...

member.name: T:MigrationTools.Tools.FieldValueMapOptions
member.summary: Need to map not just the field but also values? This is the default value mapper.

member.name: P:MigrationTools.Tools.FieldValueMapOptions.sourceField
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the source field to read values from during migration.

member.name: P:MigrationTools.Tools.FieldValueMapOptions.targetField
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the target field to write mapped values to during migration.

member.name: P:MigrationTools.Tools.FieldValueMapOptions.defaultValue
member.summary: Gets or sets the default value to use when no mapping is found for the source field value.

member.name: P:MigrationTools.Tools.FieldValueMapOptions.valueMapping
member.summary: Gets or sets the dictionary that maps source field values to target field values. Key is the source value, value is the target value.

member.name: T:MigrationTools.Tools.FieldValueToTagMapOptions
member.summary: Need to create a Tag based on a field value? Just create a regex match and choose how to populate the target.

member.name: T:MigrationTools.Tools.MultiValueConditionalMapOptions
member.summary: ??? If you know how to use this please send a PR :)

member.name: T:MigrationTools.Tools.RegexFieldMapOptions
member.summary: I just need that bit of a field... need to send "2016.2" to two fields, one for year and one for release? Done.

member.name: P:MigrationTools.Tools.RegexFieldMapOptions.sourceField
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the source field to read data from and apply regex pattern matching.

member.name: P:MigrationTools.Tools.RegexFieldMapOptions.targetField
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the target field to write the regex-transformed data to.

member.name: P:MigrationTools.Tools.RegexFieldMapOptions.pattern
member.summary: Gets or sets the regular expression pattern to match against the source field value.

member.name: P:MigrationTools.Tools.RegexFieldMapOptions.replacement
member.summary: Gets or sets the replacement pattern that defines how matched groups should be used to construct the target value.

member.name: T:MigrationTools.Tools.TreeToTagFieldMapOptions
member.summary: Need to clear out those nasty Area tree hierarchies? This creates Tags for each node in the Area Path...

member.name: P:MigrationTools.Tools.TreeToTagFieldMapOptions.toSkip
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of levels to skip from the root when converting area path hierarchy to tags. For example, if set to 2, "ProjectName\Level1\Level2\Level3" would skip "ProjectName\Level1" and start from "Level2".

member.name: P:MigrationTools.Tools.TreeToTagFieldMapOptions.timeTravel
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of months to travel back in time when looking up historical area path values. Use 0 for current values.

member.name: P:MigrationTools.Tools.Infrastructure.FieldMapOptions.Enabled
member.summary: If set to `true` then the Fieldmap will run. Set to `false` and the processor will not run.

member.name: P:MigrationTools.Tools.Infrastructure.IFieldMapOptions.ApplyTo
member.summary: A list of Work Item Types that this Field Map will apply to. If the list is empty it will apply to all Work Item Types. You can use "*" to apply to all Work Item Types.

member.name: M:MigrationTools.Tools.Infrastructure.EmbededImagesRepairToolBase`1.GetImageFormat(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Retrieve Image Format for a given byte array

member.name: P:MigrationTools.Tools.Infrastructure.ToolOptions.Enabled
member.summary: If set to `true` then the tool will run. Set to `false` and the processor will not run.

member.name: T:MigrationTools.Tools.CommonTools
member.summary: Container for common tools used across migration operations, providing centralized access to frequently used utility tools.

member.name: P:MigrationTools.Tools.CommonTools.StringManipulator
member.summary: Gets the string manipulator tool for processing string fields.

member.name: P:MigrationTools.Tools.CommonTools.WorkItemTypeMapping
member.summary: Gets the work item type mapping tool for transforming work item types.

member.name: P:MigrationTools.Tools.CommonTools.FieldMappingTool
member.summary: Gets the field mapping tool for applying field transformations.

member.name: M:MigrationTools.Tools.CommonTools.#ctor(MigrationTools.Tools.Interfaces.IStringManipulatorTool,MigrationTools.Tools.Interfaces.IWorkItemTypeMappingTool,MigrationTools.Tools.Interfaces.IFieldMappingTool)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the CommonTools class.
member.param: Tool for work item type mapping

member.name: T:MigrationTools.Tools.StringManipulatorTool
member.summary: Used to process the String fields of a work item. This is useful for cleaning up data. It will limit fields to a max length and apply regex replacements based on what is configured. Each regex replacement is applied in order and can be enabled or disabled.

member.name: T:MigrationTools.Tools.StringManipulatorToolOptions
member.summary: Configuration options for the StringManipulatorTool, defining string transformations and length limits for work item string fields.

member.name: P:MigrationTools.Tools.StringManipulatorToolOptions.MaxStringLength
member.summary: Max number of chars in a string. Applied last, and set to 1000000 by default.

member.name: P:MigrationTools.Tools.StringManipulatorToolOptions.Manipulators
member.summary: List of regex based string manipulations to apply to all string fields. Each regex replacement is applied in order and can be enabled or disabled.

member.name: T:MigrationTools.Tools.RegexStringManipulator
member.summary: Represents a regular expression-based string manipulation rule for processing work item string fields.

member.name: P:MigrationTools.Tools.RegexStringManipulator.Enabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this manipulator is enabled.

member.name: P:MigrationTools.Tools.RegexStringManipulator.Pattern
member.summary: Gets or sets the regular expression pattern to match.

member.name: P:MigrationTools.Tools.RegexStringManipulator.Replacement
member.summary: Gets or sets the replacement string for matched patterns.

member.name: P:MigrationTools.Tools.RegexStringManipulator.Description
member.summary: Gets or sets a description of what this manipulator does.

member.name: T:MigrationTools.Tools.WorkItemTypeMappingTool
member.summary: Provides mapping functionality for transforming work item types from source to target systems during migration, allowing different work item type names to be used in the target.

member.name: P:MigrationTools.Tools.WorkItemTypeMappingTool.Mappings
member.summary: Gets the dictionary of work item type mappings from source to target types.

member.name: M:MigrationTools.Tools.WorkItemTypeMappingTool.#ctor(Microsoft.Extensions.Options.IOptions{MigrationTools.Tools.WorkItemTypeMappingToolOptions},System.IServiceProvider,Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger{MigrationTools.Tools.WorkItemTypeMappingTool},MigrationTools.ITelemetryLogger)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the WorkItemTypeMappingTool class.
member.param: Configuration options for work item type mappings

member.name: T:MigrationTools.Tools.WorkItemTypeMappingToolOptions
member.summary: Configuration options for the WorkItemTypeMappingTool, defining how work item types should be mapped between source and target systems.

member.name: P:MigrationTools.Tools.WorkItemTypeMappingToolOptions.Mappings
member.summary: List of work item mappings.

member.name: T:MigrationTools.Tools.RegexWorkItemTypeMapping
member.summary: Represents a regular expression-based work item type mapping rule for dynamic type transformations.

member.name: P:MigrationTools.Tools.RegexWorkItemTypeMapping.Enabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this mapping rule is enabled.

member.name: P:MigrationTools.Tools.RegexWorkItemTypeMapping.Pattern
member.summary: Gets or sets the regular expression pattern to match work item type names.

member.name: P:MigrationTools.Tools.RegexWorkItemTypeMapping.Replacement
member.summary: Gets or sets the replacement string for matched work item type names.

member.name: P:MigrationTools.Tools.RegexWorkItemTypeMapping.Description
member.summary: Gets or sets a description of what this mapping rule does.
